name: 蒼葉
message: "You 'believe' so? There really is something wrong with you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit. I really need to take a proper look at you... Wish I had the right tools..."
I pick Ren up and touch him here and there. There doesn't seem to be any external damage.
Still, I really need to do some maintenance on him soon.
